name: Tuxedoville's Rhubarb Muffins
author: Tuxedoville
summary: Every year our rhubarb plant goes crazy and these yummy muffins are a great way to use some up quickly. Great for lunches!
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease 12 muffin cups or line with paper muffin liners
Whisk flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, and nutmeg together in a bowl; stir rhubarb and raisins into flour mixture
Whisk buttermilk, brown sugar, melted butter, and egg together in a large bowl; stir flour mixture into buttermilk mixture just until all ingredients are moistened
Divide batter evenly into the prepared muffin cups
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 25 minutes
Cool in the pans for a few minutes before removing from pan
Serve warm or at room temperature
